com.fasterxml.clustermate.client

Class StoreClient<K extends EntryKey,CONFIG extends StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.Loggable
      • com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.StoreClient<K,CONFIG>

  • public abstract class StoreClient<K extends EntryKey,CONFIG extends StoreClientConfig<K,CONFIG>>
extends Loggable
    Client used for accessing temporary store service.

    • Field Summary

      protected static long MIN_LENGTH_FOR_CHUNKED
      Let's use Chunked Transfer-Encoding for larger payloads; cut-off point is arbitrary, choose nice round number of 64k.

      protected void start()
      Method called by StoreClientBootstrapper once bootstrapping is complete to some degree.
      void stop()
      Method that must be called to stop processing thread client has
      protected void updateLoop()
      Method that keeps on calling updateOnce() until Client is requested to stop its operation.
      protected void updateOnce()
      Method that tries to update state of cluster by making a single call to "most deserving" server node.

        protected static final long MIN_LENGTH_FOR_CHUNKED
        Let's use Chunked Transfer-Encoding for larger payloads; cut-off point is arbitrary, choose nice round number of 64k.

      • getContentAsBytes

        public byte[] getContentAsBytes(K key)
                         throws InterruptedException
        Convenience method for GETting specific content and aggregating it as a byte array. Note that failure to perform GET operation will be signaled with IllegalStateException, whereas missing content is indicated by null return value.
        Returns:
        Array of bytes returned, if content exists; null if no such content exists (never PUT, or has been DELETEd)
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getContentAsBytes

        public byte[] getContentAsBytes(CONFIG config,
                       K key)
                         throws InterruptedException
        Convenience method for GETting specific content and aggregating it as a byte array. Note that failure to perform GET operation will be signaled with IllegalStateException, whereas missing content is indicated by null return value.
        Returns:
        Array of bytes returned, if content exists; null if no such content exists (never PUT, or has been DELETEd)
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getContentAsFile

        public final File getContentAsFile(K key,
                    File resultFile)
                            throws InterruptedException
        Convenience method for GETting specific content and storing it in specified file. Note that failure to perform GET operation will be signaled with IllegalStateException, whereas missing content is indicated by 'false' return value
        Returns:
        Original result file, if content exists; null if content was not found but operation succeeded (throw exception if access operation itself fails)
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getContentAsFile

        public File getContentAsFile(CONFIG config,
                    K key,
                    File resultFile)
                      throws InterruptedException
        Convenience method for GETting specific content and storing it in specified file. Note that failure to perform GET operation will be signaled with IllegalStateException, whereas missing content is indicated by 'false' return value
        Returns:
        Original result file, if content exists; null if content was not found but operation succeeded (throw exception if access operation itself fails)
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getPartialContentAsBytes

        public final byte[] getPartialContentAsBytes(K key,
                              com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.ByteRange range)
                                      throws InterruptedException
        Convenience method for GETting part of specified resource aggregated as a byte array.

        Note that failure to perform GET operation will be signaled with IllegalStateException, whereas missing content is indicated by null return value.

        Note that when accessing ranges, content will always be return uncompressed (if server compressed it, or received pre-compressed content declared with compression type).

        Parameters:
        range - Specified byte range to access, using offsets in uncompressed content
        Returns:
        Array of bytes returned, if content exists; null if no such content exists (never PUT, or has been DELETEd)
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getPartialContentAsBytes

        public byte[] getPartialContentAsBytes(CONFIG config,
                              K key,
                              com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.ByteRange range)
                                throws InterruptedException
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getPartialContentAsFile

        public final File getPartialContentAsFile(K key,
                           File resultFile,
                           com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.ByteRange range)
                                   throws InterruptedException
        Convenience method for GETting part of specified resource stored as specified file (if existing, will be overwritten).

        Note that failure to perform GET operation will be signaled with IllegalStateException, whereas missing content is indicated by null return value.

        Note that when accessing ranges, content will always be return uncompressed (if server compressed it, or received pre-compressed content declared with compression type).

        Parameters:
        range - Specified byte range to access, using offsets in uncompressed content
        Returns:
        Original result file, if content exists; null if content was not found but operation succeeded (throw exception if access operation itself fails)
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

        public final long getContentLength(K key)
                            throws InterruptedException
        Convenience method for making HEAD request to figure out length of the resource, if one exists (and -1 if not).
        Returns:
        Length of entry in bytes, if entry exists: -1 if no such entry exists

      • putContent

        public final PutOperationResult putContent(K key,
                            PutContentProvider content)
                                    throws InterruptedException
        Method called to PUT specified content into appropriate server nodes.
        Returns:
        Result object that indicates state of the operation as whole, including information on servers that were accessed during operation. Caller is expected to check details from this object to determine whether operation was successful or not.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

        Method called to start iterating over entries with given key prefix. Result object is basically an iterator, and no actual access occurs before methods are called on iterator.
